item.title: Doom Emacs Resources
item.description: Getting started with Doom Emacs Doom Emacs is a fantastic way for someone that wants to get started with the notoriously difficult to learn Emacs program. In this post, I will list the resources that I’ve used to familiarize myself with Emacs in general, and Doom Emacs in particular. DistroTube If you are a Linux user, or just a general free-software enthusiast, I highly recommend checking out DistroTube. From demoing Linux distributions such as NixOS, to discussing why he believes Fish is the best shell , he produces excellent, video content.
